msg: Use a fake ServiceUnit when deploying an endpoint in OSGi so that we are able to reuse the classloader used by spring when creating the spring context

author: psmith
msg: Provide tweaked patch provided by Thorbørn to remove a dependency on Sun's JMS stuff.
Slightly tweaked in that I retained the <optional> modifier because we don't want that to
be marked as transitive dependency (we b0rk3d that in 1.2.15, I'd hate to redo it).
